Caption: The chief guest, Sir C. V. Raman, being received at the institute by Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) and Mr. C. V. Sethunathan (Registrar)
Description: The third convocation of IIT Madras was held on the 30th of July, 1966. The convocation took place on a Saturday evening at the Institute’s Open Air Theatre. The chief guest and speaker at IIT Madras’s third convocation was Sir C. V. Raman, the Indian physicist, Nobel laureate and Bharat Ratna recipient. From left: Mr. C. V. Sethunathan (Registrar), Sir C. V. Raman, Prof. B. Sengupto (Director)
